title: Creating an Interactive Histogram With Matplotlib
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create an interactive histogram using Matplotlib. The interactivity is encoded in ECMAScript (JavaScript) and inserted in the SVG code in a post-processing step. The resulting histogram will have bars that can be hidden or shown by clicking on legend markers.
